annotations.description: The fans can't complain about what they saw on the pitch as both sides displayed a highly captivating football match. Great display from the home side, you have to say that they were the better side today. It was obvious that the hosts tried to outplay their opponents with some passing football, while the visitors focused on counter attacking play.

annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.
The Liverpool players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Milner (Liverpool) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) receives a precise low pass inside the box, controls the ball and releases it towards the right post. Unfortunately for him, Brad Guzan makes a great save to stop his effort. The referee signals a corner kick to Liverpool.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) receives a sweet pass inside the box, but his effort on goal is blocked by the defender.
What a goal scoring opportunity! Danny Ings (Liverpool) finds some space inside the box and gets in a strike, but the shot is brilliantly blocked by one of the defending players sliding in.
Aston Villa control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.
Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) unleashed a rocket of a shot aiming towards the left side of the goal, but the goalkeeper denies his attempt with a stunning save.
Adama Traore (Aston Villa) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
What a chance that is! Micah Richards (Aston Villa) displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick, but he steers his header narrowly over the crossbar.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) picks up a pass and hits the ball towards goal, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Brad Guzan.
Nathaniel Clyne (Liverpool) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence clears the ball to safety. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Liverpool.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Milner (Liverpool) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates as he overhits the effort.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) produces a shot from a mid range free kick. His effort is directed under the crossbar but is caught by the goalkeeper. Liverpool get a corner.
Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) delivers a promising cross into the box, but it's cleared. The ball is behind the touchline and Liverpool will take a throw in.
Great teamplay by Liverpool as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal – 3:2! Jordan Amavi sends a precise lofted pass into the box, Rudy Gestede (Aston Villa) rises above the defenders to meet the ball near the penalty spot and heads it straight into the net via the underside of the crossbar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball

Up to now the game has been rather average in terms of entertainment, with little in the way of thrilling moments. The home side is easily dictating the tempo in this game. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.
